message.entry: File {0} does not have EXIF metadata. Use the ''ExposureValues'' or ''RelativeExposure'' parameter to provide exposure information.
File {0} does not have exposure metadata. Use the ''ExposureValues'' or ''RelativeExposure'' parameter to provide exposure information.
Specify only one of these parameters ''BaseFile'', ''ExposureValues'', or ''RelativeExposure'' for exposure values.
The number of ''ExposureValues'' elements must match the number of files.
The number of ''RelativeExposure'' elements must match the number of files.
Input images must be of the same size. File ''{0}'' does not match.
'CameraResponse' must be a matrix of size {0}-by-{1}.
Input images must be of the same bit depth. File ''{0}'' does not match.
Input images must be of the same class.
Specify either of ''ExposureValues'' or ''RelativeExposure'' for exposure values.
Low dynamic range images cannot be of class ''single'' or ''double''.
Input matrices must be of the same size.
Inputs must be non-empty, non-sparse, real matrices of size M-by-N or M-by-N-by-3.
